arts.ttl: 'Really bad decision' - MOTD pundits on Everton penalty
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundits Danny Murphy and Alan Shearer believe Everton should not have been awarded a penalty in their Premier League draw against Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Arsenal drop more points in title race with draw at Everton
arts.sum: Ndiaye stroked home from 12 yards to score his seventh Premier League goal of the season, the most for Everton this season, after Myles Lewis-Skelly had fouled Jack Harrison early in the second half. Ahead of the first leg of Arsenal's UEFA Champions League quarter-final tie against Real Madrid on Tuesday, Martin Odegaard, Bukayo Saka and Gabriel Martinelli all started on the bench and were unable to make an impact after coming on.

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta offers Arsenal update after latest injury scare vs Everton
arts.sum: An injury-hit Arsenal side were held to a 1-1 draw with Everton at Goodison Park on Saturday with the Gunners being given a fresh concern during the game on Merseyside

arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta hits out at referee after Arsenal slip up against Everton
arts.sum: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta was left furious by the decision to award Everton a penalty that proved decisive during Saturday's 1-1 draw at Goodison Park.

arts.ttl: Leandro Trossard points finger of blame after Arsenal slip-up vs Everton
arts.sum: Arsenal could only record a 1-1 draw against Everton at Goodison Park after taking the lead through Leandro Trossard, and the Belgian was frustrated with the manner of the Gunners' stalemate

arts.ttl: Mike Dean gives honest verdict on Arsenal penalty controversy after costly Everton draw
arts.sum: Arsenal will feel they were unfortunate to concede a penalty against Everton after Myles Lewis-Skelly was adjudged to have fouled Jack Harrison during their 1-1 draw at Goodison Park on Saturday

arts.ttl: Everton 1-1 Arsenal (5 de Abr., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Controversial penalty costs Arsenal at Everton
arts.sum: Highlights from the Premier League match between Everton and Arsenal.

arts.ttl: Arsenal fans react to the prospect of Jakub Kiwior starting against Real Madrid after his heroics at Everton
arts.sum: Arsenal were left reeling by confirmation that Gabriel Magalhaes has suffered a season-ending injury. Gabriel sustained a hamstring injury during Tuesday nightâ€™s Premier League meeting...

arts.ttl: Premier League deny VAR claims after baffling incident during Everton vs Arsenal
arts.sum: Jake O'Brien was booked during the first half after a strange turn of events during Everton vs Arsenal
